excerpt.rendered:
Teague Collection

A natural selection for your transitional home, the Teague Collection will complement your lifestyle. The Marble painted top is set in a diamond pattern in this casual dining offering. With brown faux leather/Rexcin seating and an espresso finish to compliment it all, this dining collection will be a welcome addition to your home.

6 Seater Dining Table Set Dimensions:

width:  36-40 inches
length: 68-72 inches
Height: 29-31 inches

  • Wood effect table with wood effect legs.
  • table top High Gloss finish.
  • Self-assembly – 2 people recommended.

Chair:

  • Includes 4 chairs and stool of two person.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat rexine.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
